title: Barrier story
creator_contributor_role: Australian National Film Board, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Social life and customs
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Mineral industries - Australia - History
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Mines and mineral resources - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Australia - Social conditions
description: Shows the city and people of Broken Hill, situated on one of the richest silver, lead and zinc fields in the world. Emphasis is laid on the rapid development of Broken Hill into a modern mining community with all the facilities for pleasant living and recreation. There is wealth and security, social progress and industrial peace in the 'Barrier City'.
